headline: How Allegion’s 8% Dividend Hike At Allegion (ALLE) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Allegion plc recently declared a quarterly dividend of US$0.55 per ordinary share, an 8% increase from 2025 and its 12th consecutive annual dividend raise, payable on March 31, 2026 to shareholders of record on March 13, 2026. At the same time, analysts are projecting year-over-year growth in earnings and revenue, suggesting that Allegion’s higher dividend is being underpinned by expectations of stronger operating performance across both its Americas and International segments. With...
